title: Mirror, ca. 1720
description:
Also known as 1950-112-2a; Associated with 1950-112-2-b,c

Original rectangular bevelled glass. Inner gilt molding carved with reglarized floriation in low relief; shaped at upper corners. Wider conforming cyma and bead walnut molding outside. Cresting, with gilded ears of voluted leaf carving, is itself scrolled, voluted, and pierced at center to admit a round pierced gilded ornament. Shaped base has ears similar to above and bears a pair of engraved brass sockets which receive two scrolled candle brackets with circular candle sockets and cups.
